1081660.name: The Coroner Saga: Complete Season 1
1081660.description:
Become a Coroner
Sara is a young doctor who just completed Med School with the highest degrees. Uncertain about her future she joins the Coroners' State Institute and the adventure begins!

Every Episode in Season 1
Each season is made of 6 episodes and each episode's duration is about 3-4 hours in gameplay.
This DLC package includes every episode of season 1. By buying the package you save on the price of the single episode, earning two for free (buying the first episode is still needed as it contains the base game).

Episodes and their release

EPISODE 1: The Debbie Downer *** AVAILABLE NOW ***
EPISODE 2: The Body Don't Lie *** AVAILABLE NOW ***
EPISODE 3: Deadly Truth *** AVAILABLE NOW ***
EPISODE 4: Hidden Mask - 02/06/2021
EPISODE 5: To be announced
EPISODE 6: To be announced
